title: News
body: Order comes following seven petitions filed by the state Arrested from residence hours after home adviser's directive Scenes in the play ‘hurt religious sentiments’, they say All district election officers asked to submit the final list within five working days Arrangement of land underway to relocate hawkers, he says Party secretary general alleges political harassment Tribunal sets January 7 for hearing in crime against humanity case Foreign Adviser Touhid says India's advice on Bangladesh’s election not acceptable
